verses.roman:
vipṛṣṭho dhṛtadevāyām
eka ānakadundubheḥ
śāntidevātmajā rājan
praśama-prasitādayaḥ

synonyms: vipṛṣṭhaḥ—Vipṛṣṭha; dhṛtadevāyām—in the womb of the wife named Dhṛtadevā; ekaḥ—one son; ānakadundubheḥ—of Ānakadundubhi, Vasudeva; śāntidevā-ātmajāḥ—the sons of another wife, named Śāntidevā; rājan—O Mahārāja Parīkṣit; praśama-prasita-ādayaḥ—Praśama, Prasita and other sons.
translation: From the womb of Dhṛtadevā, one of the wives of Ānakadundubhi [Vasudeva], came a son named Vipṛṣṭha. The sons of Śāntidevā, another wife of Vasudeva, were Praśama, Prasita and others.
